The fglrx driver does not support your card
You need to remove all the fglrx packages and reinstall libgl1-mesa-glx and libgl1-mesa-dri
In any event, you shouldn't install any driver for this card in ubuntu because the default radeon driver has 3D already working
And the alternative fglrx doesn't have support for your gpu anymore
